outputs.output_descr:
PEMSEA is in the process of transforming from a project-based, fixed-term entity into a long-term self-supporting regional mechanism focusing on the implementation of the SDS-SEA. Part of the regional mechanism is the PEMSEA Resource Facility (PRF), which will provide Secretariat Services and Technical Services. The countries of the region has agreed to support the PRF Secretariat Services through financial and in-kind contributions.

The project will assist in building up the capacity of the PRF and PEMSEA participating countries in the development, management and operation of the PRF Secretariat Services, which will in turn facilitate the implementation of the GEF/UNDP/UNOPS project and support the development of a self-sustaining regional mechanism for the implementation of the SDS-SEA

project_descr: Supporting the Partnerships in Environmental Management for the Seas of East Asia (PEMSEA) Resource Facility Secretariat Services Towards the Sustainable Implementation of the Sustainable Development Strategy for the Seas of East Asia (SDS-SEA).
project_title: Supporting PEMSEA Resource Facility Secretariat Services
